Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and high-quality materials, this product stands out in its category. I believe it could significantly enhance your experience and productivity. Considering its exceptional value, I am offering it to you for $150. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored for you, and I hope you'll find it worth considering. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
